task_requirements:
Review the Harness module implementation.

**Files to Review in core/typescript/harness/:**
- types.ts - Harness type definitions
- projects.ts - createAuthSetupProject, createBrowserProjects
- reporters.ts - getReporterConfig
- playwright.config.base.ts - createPlaywrightConfig, getTierSettings, getUseOptions
- index.ts - Barrel export
- __tests__/config.test.ts - Config factory unit tests

**Validation:**
- Creates complete Playwright config from artk.config.yml
- 65/65 harness tests passing, 566 total tests passing
- Proper integration with all US1-US7 modules
- ESM build successful
